main event: On July 29, 1958, an unidentified object was sighted in the sky by the Government US Coast Guard at a latitude of 16.0 North and 76.5 West.
interesting points: The object was initially traveling eastward before changing direction to approximately northeast., It disappeared completely at 2518 GMT after bearing 54 degrees true., Three white lights were seen intermittently emanating from the main body of the object., The object did not resemble any jet plane exhaust and appeared to be surrounded by haze., The sighting was witnessed by the Chief Radio Officer and the Second Mate along with two ABs on bridge watch.
witness description: Chief Radio Officer, Second Mate, and two ABs on bridge watch
